description: Spain's health minister urges more restrictions in Madrid, stoking a political row as cases spike.
title: Coronavirus: Madrid at serious risk without tougher rules, minister warns
title_page: Coronavirus: Madrid at serious risk without tougher rules, minister warns - BBC News
maintext: From Monday, residents in these areas will only be able to leave their zone to go to work, school or to seek medical care. Social gatherings within each zone will be limited to six, public parks will be shut and commercial businesses will need to close by 22:00.
